item.title: 1. Personalising our CRM
item.description: Learning Aim: Understand the easy ways to alter an existing view Prerequisites: To be a competent user of agilebase, with Citizen Developer level 1 (or higher) enabled Introduction The guide is going to introduce to you some of the features that become available to you once youâ€™ve been given the role of Citizen Developer. In essence, you now have the power to make small tweaks to the system that just affect yourself, helping you customise how it works and hopefully making it a more efficient and enjoyable process.
